posts.post_content:
Range from Good to Very Good; a few might grade at 40, but the majority would be under that.  With one exception, all cards are Piedmont backs.  The Bates is a Sovereign.  I believe the Birmingham to be trimmed.  The Collins was deemed altered by SGC.  The Bates, Covaleski, Evers and Killian were soaked.  Asking $600 delivered for the lot; paypal preferred:

John Anderson
Johnny Bates
Joe Birmingham
Bill Clymer
Eddie Collins
Harry Covaleski
Patsy Dougherty (Portrait)
Jack Dunn
Johnny Evers (With Bat, Chicago On Shirt)
Cecil Ferguson
Wilbur Goode
Ed Killian (Pitching)
Frank King
Harry Sentz (Lentz)
Clyde Milan
Francis (Big Jeff) Pfeffer
Claude Ritchey
George Stovall (Portrait)
Ira Thomas
Hooks Wiltse (Pitching)
Is the Lentz card still available? If so how much?
